title: Gas Trap
summaries: The Gas Trap is a trap item obtained by throwing a Whoopie Cushion into Shimmer. It can also be activated from Chests in No traps and Get fixed boi worlds.

After being placed in a storage item, the Gas Trap will activate the next time that storage item is opened, dealing 20 / 40 / 60 damage to nearby players and 10 damage to nearby enemies, NPCs, and critters, and inflicting all entities within a small radius with the Poisoned debuff for 49 seconds / 1 minute 38 seconds / 2 minutes 3 seconds. The Gas Trap then becomes a Used Gas Trap and can only be refilled by throwing it into Shimmer producing a new Gas Trap. Only one Gas Trap will be used at a time whenever a player opens a storage item. A Gas Trap will not activate if the storage item it was placed in is opened in a singleplayer world while autopause is enabled.
